title: Aubergine and cheese bake
ingredients: ['1 large aubergine, sliced 1cm thick', 'vegetable oil', '2 teacups tinned tomatoes', '1/4 teaspoon dried oregano', '1/4 teaspoon dried thyme', '1/4 teaspoon dried rosemary', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '1 bay leaf', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '2 tablespoons grated onion', '2 tablespoons grated carrot', '2 tablespoons grated green pepper', '6 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '225g (8 oz) mozzarella cheese, thinly sliced', 'cooked rice, to serve']
